content.raw:
In order to visualize the diff, I copied your multisense.urdf into our repo as multisense_sl.urdf in 5af34cf (drcsim branch issue_386).

It's probably non-controversial to modify some of the <gazebo> tags. Just as a starting point, it seems strange to have the foot contact sensors in the head (removed in 56b36bb). I would also propose restoring the IMU sensor and gazebo plugin (5e2e32f), which are not present in the crl urdf.

We can use the bitbucket compare feature to track the remaining differences:

#!/osrf/drcsim/compare/issue_386..drcsim_3.1#diff
